data.text: Give Dad a trip to this year's most charming destination, CUBA! Get 10% off all flights from Port of Spain to Havana between 1st - 31st July, 2018 when you book NOW! Hurry, this sale only last 24 hours! Visit us at https://t.co/HVr0rW8xM6 to get dad the trip he deserves. https://t.co/6Ota9Pphjr

@Maryrnelsonyah1 Hi Maryr, we're truly disheartened to hear of your experience and we'd like to assist. Could you please reach out to our team so that we can check on this for you? Please select the number form this listing that best suits your location: https://t.co/64DurRCfby.
@miserable1982 Hi Ryan, we're so sorry for the delay. Could you please reach out to us for an update? Please see our contact numbers here: https://t.co/FmF3VAGrPz.

@krystalclair Hi Kystal, we're sorry for your friend's loss. We do offer fare discounts to those who need to travel due to the death of a family member. For more information on this, please click here: https://t.co/TzTnwBtS1r
@drhakimw Hi , we're truly disheartened to hear of your experience. Could you please reach out to our Customers Relations team so that we may assist? You may contact us here: https://t.co/8XrPa4Bjwe.
